features: • Initial test of the core features

• Inside the 'World' tab you can now generate sample data to test all the features without any imports
• To get all the meta data information click on item in the grid or start the slideshow

• Small UI changes inside the AlbumView
• new buggy WorldView
• first draft of the final MeView
• first draft of the SettingsPage

• fixed World Tab of all imported locations
• possibility to change the color of the location pins in AlbumEditView

• updated colors of the app icon
• adjusted date UI on the ‚MapWorldView’
• improved UI of the meta data in the Slideshow

• fixed UI of awards in ‚Me‘ tab
• updated draft of settings tab

• fixed the weather meta data detail view with updated UI
• new experimental tab ‚ML’ to test image classification with results based sounds effects
• smaller bug fixes

• optimized UI in tab ‚ML’
• improved ‚Slideshow’ device performance
• improved ‚Slideshow‘ UI
• small adjustments in the ‚Album‘ section

• ML tab can play sounds fetched by an API
• possibility to play and pause the sounds sounds
• get different sounds through the brand new shuffle button

• Improved Slideshow with included sound API
• Adjust the Slideshow UI with classificationResults or automatically playing sounds in the settings under ‚Slideshow Settings‘
• Fixed sorting order of ‚AlbumView‘ to start date of the album
• Removed ML tab since all features are transferred inside the main application

• Fixed sound issues in the Slideshow
• Adjusted build version of the app

• Completely improved Slideshow experience with known gestures of Instagram and new settings options
• Added new settings in ‚SettingsGeneral‘ to personalize metadata
• Added new settings in ‚SettingsSlideshow‘

• NEW: Sidebar in the slideshow with quick options
• NEW: Changelog overview in the settings footer
• Overhaul of the whole ‚Settings’ tab
• First working statistics in the ‚Me‘ tab

• Fixed UI for iPadOS and macOS
• Fixed initial UI at the launch of the app with no albums
• NEW hidden ’Survey Settings’ with a lot of adjustments to evaluate the app with its features

• Fixed Crashing while opening the ‚Settings‘ Tab
• Changed Image Classification Model from MobileNetV2 to Resnet50
